Obviously, but there's a big difference between "dont put it in the face of people that are not interested in it" and "screw the ones that would want it, they're a minority anyway".
The question was "should I provide configuration options to user", not "will everybody use it".
So the answers are "yes" to the first and "no" to the second, that's not contradictory.
